sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"人类"之意。
means: man ： 指各时代的全体人类。
mankind ： 集体名词，语体庄重，泛指过去、现在和未来的人类。
humanity ： 书面用词，集合名词，多用于文学作品中，作人类解时，侧重有同情心、理解力和崇高品质。

(表示赞赏、鼓励的感叹语)太棒了!干得好! Go-man-go! She's just full of jazz.太棒了!她真的浑身是劲儿。

example.en: This is my man Sam, who's gonna show you how to dance.

list.explanation: (黑人用语)无足轻重的人，不值得重视的人

example.en: He seems like a man with a paper ass to me; don't pay him any attention.

example.en: Lou Reed,he is my main man.
example.zh: 卢.里德，我最要好的朋友。

example.en: He's been her main man for two years. Do you think they'll get married?
example.zh: 他是她的情人有两年了。你认为他们会结婚吗？

list.explanation: (在劫案或骗局中作里应外合的)内线人物

example.en: Sam had been an inside man who was involved in a robbery.
example.zh: 山姆参与了一桩抢劫案，他是个内线人物。

list.explanation: (监狱用语)善于拍马、谄媚的犯人

word_mean: man-machine weather forecast  利用电子计算机在终端显示的信息或加工产品，由预报员根据天气学理论和经验进行修正而作出的预报。
man-machine communica-tion 人通过输入装置给计算机输入各种数据和命令，以进行操纵和控制，而计算机则执行命令和将数据处理的结果及时地显示出来的人机交互过程。

sentences.cn: 迈克是一个既有魅力又有教养的男子。

sentences.en: Growing old is something a man has to accept.
sentences.cn: 逐渐衰老是任何人都得承认的事实。

sentences.en: Man has been trying to control nature.
sentences.cn: 人类一直在努力控制自然。

means.word_mean: 不耐烦或生气时对男人的称呼）你这家伙
给…配备人员; 操纵； 在…岗位上工作；操纵（机器等）

sentences.en: Man yourself for dangers ahead.
sentences.cn: 鼓起勇气, 应付当前危机。

lj.lj_ly: I'm as ambitious as the next man.
lj.lj_ls: 我像其他人一样有抱负。

jx.jx_en_mean: be the person perfectly suited to a particular requirement or task

lj.lj_ly: for any colouring and perming services, David's your man.
lj.lj_ls: 只要是染发和烫发，戴维是你的最佳人选。

phrase.cizu_name: be man enough to do (或 for)

lj.lj_ly: he has not been man enough to face up to his responsibilities.
lj.lj_ls: 他没有足够的勇气来面对自己要负的责任。

phrase.cizu_name: every man for himself and the devil take the hindm

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)everyone should (or does) look after their own interests rather than considering those of others
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)各人自己照管自己，自顾自

lj.lj_ly: in previous student flats she'd shared, it was every man for himself.
lj.lj_ls: 在她以前住过的学生公寓里，大家都自己顾自己。

lj.lj_ly: full speed ahead and the devil take the hindmost.

phrase.cizu_name: make a man out of someone

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an experience or person) turn a young man into a mature adult
jx.jx_cn_mean: （经历或人）使某人成熟，使某人长大成人

lj.lj_ly: I make men out of them and teach them never to let anyone outsmart them.
lj.lj_ls: 我帮他们走向成熟并教导他们绝不要败给任何人。

lj.lj_ly: the time when families worked in the fields man and boy.
lj.lj_ls: 家家户户终生忙碌于田间的年代。

jx.jx_en_mean: the imagined likeness of a face seen on the surface of a full moon
an ordinary person, often with regard to their opinions, or as distinct from an expert

lj.lj_ly: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
lj.lj_ls: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

lj.lj_ly: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
lj.lj_ls: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

jx.jx_en_mean: a man who adheres to what is right or to a high standard of conduct
the male head of a household

entry.def: A man is an adult male human being.

example.ex: He had not expected the young man to reappear before evening...
example.tran: 他没想到这位年轻男子会在黄昏前再次出现。

example.ex: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
example.tran: 我一向认为他是个正直的人。

entry.def: Man and men are sometimes used to refer to all human beings, including both males and females. Some people dislike this use.
entry.tran: 人，人类（此用法仍有争议）

example.ex: The chick initially has no fear of man...
example.tran: 小鸡天生并不怕人。

example.ex: Anxiety is modern man's natural state.
example.tran: 焦虑是现代人的自然状态。

entry.def: If you say that a man is, for example, a gambling man or an outdoors man, you mean that he likes gambling or outdoor activities.

example.ex: Are you a gambling man, Mr Graham?...
example.tran: 格雷厄姆先生，你是好赌的人吗?

example.ex: He is a keen outdoors man with a great interest in photography and walking.
example.tran: 他非常喜欢户外运动，酷爱摄影和徒步旅行。

entry.def: If you say that a man is, for example, a London man or an Oxford man, you mean that he comes from London or Oxford, or went to university there.
entry.tran: （来自某地的）人；（在某地上过学的）人

example.ex: ...as the Stockport man collected his winnings...
example.tran: 在那名来自斯托克波特的人收拢他赢的钱的时候

example.ex: Attlee was an  Oxford man.
example.tran: 艾德礼是名牛津学子。

entry.def: If you refer to a particular company's or organiza-tion's man, you mean a man who works for or represents that company or organization.
entry.tran: (某公司或组织的男性)职员，代表

example.ex: ...the Daily Telegraph's man in Abu Dhabi.
example.tran: 《每日电讯报》驻阿布扎比的记者

example.ex: ...America's man at the United Nations.
example.tran: 美国驻联合国人员

entry.def: If you say that a man is someone's man, you mean that he always supports that person or does what they want.

example.ex: At the time he was said to be very much Rajiv Gandhi's man.
example.tran: 据说他当时是拉吉夫·甘地的铁杆支持者。

entry.def: Some people refer to a woman's husband, lover, or boyfriend as her man .

example.ex: ...if they see your man cuddle you in the kitchen or living room.
example.tran: 假如他们看见你的男朋友在厨房或起居室里搂着你的话

entry.def: In the armed forces, the men are soldiers, sailors, marines, or airmen of lower rank, as opposed to the officers.

example.ex: 150 officers and men had to be taken straight to hospital.
example.tran: 不得不将150名官兵直接送往了医院。

example.ex: ...a drill sergeant who would work with the men at least one hour every morning.
example.tran: 每天早晨至少和士兵操练一小时的操练中士

entry.def: Male workers are sometimes referred to as men, especially if they do physical work or work for a more senior person.
entry.tran: （尤指从事体力劳动或为上级工作的）男工，男雇员，男下属

example.ex: The men voted by a four-to-one majority to accept the pay offer...
example.tran: 男雇员以4比1的多数票接受了工资条件。

example.ex: After the talks, the leader of the Workers' Council said his men would be going back down the mines.
example.tran: 会谈之后，工人委员会的领袖说他手下的工人们会重回井下工作。

entry.def: One man sometimes addresses another as 'man' when he is angry or impatient with him.
entry.tran: (对男子的称呼，表示生气或不耐烦)老兄，老弟，小伙子

example.ex: I told you, man! It'll be sometime after eight o'clock.
example.tran: 老兄，我告诉过你了，时间是八点以后。

entry.def: In very informal social situations, man is sometimes used as a greeting or form of address to a man.
entry.tran: （在非正式场合中用以称呼男子）老弟,老兄

example.ex: Hey wow, man! Where d'you get those boots?
example.tran: 哎哟，老弟，哪里搞来的靴子？

entry.def: If you man something such as a place or machine, you operate it or are in charge of it.
entry.tran: 在…岗位上工作;操作(机器等)

example.ex: French soldiers manned roadblocks in the capital city.
example.tran: 法国士兵把守着首都的各路关卡。

example.ex: ...the person manning the phone at the complaints department...
example.tran: 投诉部的接线生

entry.def: If you say that a man is man enough to do something, you mean that he has the necessary courage or ability to do it.

example.ex: I told him that he should be man enough to admit he had done wrong...
example.tran: 我对他说，他应该勇于承认错误。

example.ex: You can search me if you think you're man enough.
example.tran: 有胆的话，你可以搜我的身。

entry.def: If you describe a man as a man's man, you mean that he has qualities which make him popular with other men rather than with women.
entry.tran: 更受男人（而非女人）欢迎的男人

entry.def: People sometimes address a man as my man .

example.ex: 'Get the guy in the purple shirt.' — 'All right, my man.'
example.tran: “把那个穿紫衬衫的家伙叫过来。”——“好的，老兄。”

entry.def: people sometimes address a man as my man ,my dear man, or my good man. This form of address is often friendly, but can also suggest that the speaker feels superior to the person being addressed.
entry.tran: 我的老兄，我的老弟(对地位比自己低的人的友好称呼，但略带屈尊俯就之意)

example.ex: My dear man, you are welcome to stay...
example.tran: 我的老弟，欢迎你留下来。

example.ex: It's not for you to say so, my man!
example.tran: 你不该这么说，老弟！

entry.def: If you say that a man is his own man, you approve of the fact that he makes his decisions and his plans himself, and does not depend on other people.
entry.tran: 能自己做主;无须听命于他人

example.ex: Be your own man. Make up your own mind...
example.tran: 要有主见，你自己做主吧。

example.ex: He'll be his own man and won't be dictated to.
example.tran: 他要自己做决定，不会被他人左右。

entry.def: If you say that a group of men are, do, or think something to a man, you are emphasizing that every one of them is, does, or thinks that thing.

example.ex: To a man, the surveyors blamed the government...
example.tran: 调查员们无一例外地都指责政府。

example.ex: They died, to a man, when they tried to break out...
example.tran: 他们企图逃走的时候全都丢掉了性命。

entry.def: A man-to-man conversation or meeting takes place between two men, especially two men who meet to discuss a serious personal matter.
entry.tran: 私下的;一对一的;开诚布公的

example.ex: He called me to his office for a man-to-man talk...
example.tran: 他把我叫到他的办公室私下谈了谈。

example.ex: Me and Ben should sort this out man to man.
example.tran: 我和本应该把这件事坦率地说清楚。

means.word_mean: 1. an adult male person (as opposed to a woman);

sentences.sentence: "there were two women and six men on the bus"

means.word_mean: 2. someone who serves in the armed forces; a member of a military force;
3. the generic use of the word to refer to any human being;
4. all of the inhabitants of the earth;

sentences.sentence: "she always used `humankind' because `mankind' seemed to slight the women"

means.word_mean: 5. any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae

sentences.sentence: "the chief stationed two men outside the building"
"he awaited word from his man in Havana"

means.word_mean: 7. an adult male person who has a manly character (virile and courageous competent);

sentences.sentence: "the army will make a man of you"

means.word_mean: 8. a male person who plays a significant role (husband or lover or boyfriend) in the life of a particular woman;

sentences.sentence: "she takes good care of her man"

means.word_mean: 9. a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to his employer;
10. game equipment consisting of an object used in playing certain board games;

sentences.sentence: "he taught me to set up the men on the chess board"
"he sacrificed a piece to get a strategic advantage"

means.word_mean: 1. take charge of a certain job; occupy a certain work place;

sentences.sentence: "Mr. Smith manned the reception desk in the morning"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English man(n), (plural) menn (noun), mannian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch man, German Mann, and Sanskrit manu 'mankind'

means: Magnetic Automatic Navigation 磁性自动导航

sentences.cn: 总之，最能表现目前这种危机的是一个典型的漫画场景：早餐时间，一个男人坐在餐桌旁看报纸，手里的报纸遮住了脸，而一个女人则怒视报纸背面，想和他说话。
sentences.en: In short，the image that best represents the current crisis is the stereotypical cartoon scene of a man sitting at the breakfast table with a newspaper held up in front of his face, while a woman glares at the back of it，wanting to talk.

sentences.cn: ( 33 )  至于性别，数字鸿沟存在于男人和女人之间。
sentences.en: With 33 regard to sex, digital divide exists between men and women.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: Chast 的设计，例如小船上孤单忧虑的男人，反映了这种脆弱。
sentences.en: Chast’s designs, such as a worried man alone in a tiny rowboat, reflect that delicateness.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 故事中,向来都是善良的女人挽救了作恶的男人.
sentences.en: Good women have always saved sinful men in story.

sentences.cn: 预计的稳定性极限往往在数值上与热试中测得的明显不同.
sentences.en: The predicted stability limits often differ appreciably in magnitude from those observed in hot firings.

sentences.cn: 他是个迟钝的男人.
sentences.en: He is a dull man.

sentences.cn: 男人说他们也喜欢, 但当女人看不到时, 男人踢猫.
sentences.en: Men say they love cats, but when women arent looking, men kick cats.

sentences.cn: 他非常反感这个只会说场面话的男人.
sentences.en: He loathes this man, who only speaks civilities.

sentences.cn: 男人(做坏事)被抓住时看上去总那么傻,而且男人总是被抓住.
sentences.en: MRS . CHEVELEY. Men always look so silly when they are caught are always being caught.

sentences.cn: 而是五英尺高度中,有一个女人就有三十个男人.
sentences.en: But while at five foot ten there are thirty men for every woman.

sentences.cn: 这时有两位乘着汽船的男人经过这里,表示要营救他.
sentences.en: Now two men in a motorboat came by and offered to rescue him.

sentences.cn: 没有哪个男人能永远迷人.
sentences.en: No man is charming all of the time.

sentences.cn: 轮到第二个男人,圣彼得解释了相同的事,要他说说自己的死亡原因.
sentences.en: The second man up and Peter explains to him about and again asks for his story.

sentences.cn: 他是一个矮胖的男人.
sentences.en: He is a squat man.

sentences.cn: 一个男人甚至点了一杯琴酒与可乐外带.
sentences.en: One man ordered rum and Coke to go.

sentences.cn: 她那迷人的举止足以使所有的男人为之神魂颠倒.
sentences.en: Her winning ways were always enough to lure any man on.

sentences.cn: 当他说男人天生就比女人强时,她非常生气.
sentences.en: It makes her very angry when he says that men are intrinsically superior to women.

sentences.cn: 但是风吹得越猛, 那个男人就把帽子和外套弄得越紧.
sentences.en: But the harder he blew, the tighter the man held his hat and coat.

sentences.cn: 那男人因殴打孩子而被捕了.
sentences.en: The man was arrested for beating up on the children.

sentences.cn: 男人们相遇的时候, 通常只是相视一笑, 或者随意地说声 “ 你好 ”
sentences.en: When a man meets a male friend, he just smiles, and says " Hello "

sentences.cn: 男人将一支香蕉切成两半,把切口处压在水箱表面.
sentences.en: The man sliced one in half and pressed the cut end against the radiator.

sentences.cn: 一个穿着灯芯绒夹克、身材相当结实的男人缓缓朝他左边移动.
sentences.en: A heavily built man in a corduroy jacket edged closer to him on his left.

sentences.cn: 没有女人,男人什么都不是,不教育妇女, 我们所剩无几!
sentences.en: Without women we men are nothing. Without educating women, we are less.

sentences.cn: 那个男人一拳正好打在他的眼睛上.
sentences.en: The man hit him sock in the eye.

sentences.cn: 而男人买充气娃娃的话,这可算得上惨剧.
sentences.en: When men buy a up doll it's pathetic.

sentences.cn: 但是男人们会哭丧着脸在大厅里踱上几个小时.
sentences.en: Men around for hours with their faces collapsed.

sentences.cn: 大厅里还有两位没有喝醉的男人和他们的气势汹汹的太太.
sentences.en: The hall was at present occupied by two sober men and their indignant wives.

sentences.cn: 对于男人来说,为什么女人控制性生活?
sentences.en: Why women have controlsex compared to men?

sentences.cn: 一些妇女有纤细的弓眉. 成为鲜明对比的是, 一些男人有浓密的粗眉.
sentences.en: Some women have finely arched eyebrows. In contrast, some men have rough bushy eyebrows.

sentences.cn: 男人们是否已经陷入某种心理健康的困扰中了?
sentences.en: Are men at risk for particular mental health concerns?

sentences.cn: 人类给环境带来的破坏
sentences.en: the damage caused by man to the environment

sentences.cn: 科比: 我认为在G2时才算结束.
sentences.en: KOBE: I think after Game 2 was it.

sentences.cn: 河流正在日益为人类所利用.
sentences.en: Rivers are being increasingly made use of by man.

sentences.cn: 人类远涉西部,期望能征服美洲大荒野.
sentences.en: Man came further futher west to stake their claim on the great American wilderness.

sentences.cn: 电视是人类所创造的最有威力的游说工具.
sentences.en: Television is the most powerful persuasion that man has ever created.

sentences.cn: 人类学家小心翼翼地将人类以往的每一个时代都贴上标签.
sentences.en: The past ages of man have all been carefully labeled by anthropologists.

sentences.cn: 当地民间传说中称,史前人类把野牛从这些悬崖上驱赶下去.
sentences.en: Local folklore has it that prehistoric men drove cattle over these cliffs.

sentences.cn: 每一年它的力量都在增长, 因为大多数人类正可为它的目的效力.
sentences.en: Each year it gains in strength, for most Men are ripe to its purpose.

sentences.cn: 人类在探索真理过程中必然会遭受挫折.
sentences.en: Man will suffer many disappointments in his quest for truth.

sentences.cn: 这些全都在人类已知的认识范畴之内.
sentences.en: It is all within the knowledge base of man.

sentences.cn: 上帝愿人类幸福.
sentences.en: God wills that man should be happy.

sentences.cn: 从人类身上, 鸣鹤既没有得到爱也没有得到尊敬.
sentences.en: From men, the whooping crane has received neither love nor respect.

sentences.cn: 全人类共同追求和平.
sentences.en: Follow after peace with all men.

sentences.cn: 人类离不开友情, 犹如鱼儿离不开水.
sentences.en: As water is to fish, so friendship is to man.

sentences.cn: 他的笔就是人类和各个民族的救世主.
sentences.en: Hhe pen is the great liberator of men and nations.

sentences.cn: 在这里看来,人类艰苦前进的历史终究是令人置信的.
sentences.en: Here at last seemed credible history of the difficult advance of man.

sentences.cn: 早期的人类把一切的事物都用生命现象来解释.
sentences.en: In the early days of his history man took everything as a phenomenon of life.

sentences.cn: 人类已经登上了月球.
sentences.en: Men have already visited the moon.

sentences.cn: 宙斯识破了这套把戏,普罗米修斯对人类的偏爱让他很不高兴.
sentences.en: Zeus saw through the trick and felt displeased at the Titan's favour towards men.

sentences.cn: 不过由于人类在非洲这种炎热的气候中进化, 汗水带走了身体中的钠.
sentences.en: But as man evolved in the hot climate of Africa, perspiration robbed the body of sodium.

sentences.cn: 语言是人类头脑最重要的产物.
sentences.en: Language is the most important mental creation of man.

sentences.cn: 希望原是人类心灵中最后破灭的东西.
sentences.en: Hope is the last thing extinguished in the heart of man.

sentences.cn: 大自然就象它的孩子――人类一样,有活生生的灵魂.
sentences.en: Nature has her animating spirit as well as man who is nature's child.

sentences.cn: 环境改变的速度不再顺从大自然从容不迫的节奏,而是顺从人类急切匆匆的步伐.
sentences.en: The rapidity of change impetuous pace of man rather than the deliberate pace of nature.

sentences.cn: 什么是人类珍视的东西 呢 ?难道不都是些烟云泡影 吗 ?
sentences.en: What are those things that are dear to man? Are they not bubbles?

sentences.cn: 人类正在研究和利用太阳.
sentences.en: Man is now absorbinging and using the sun.

sentences.cn: 想像力正是人类草拟所有计划乃至成形的工作场所.
sentences.en: The imagination is literally the workshop wherein are fashioned all plans created by man.

sentences.cn: 人类再一次不得不作出决定:把一项发明用于造福还是用于作恶.
sentences.en: Once again, man will have to decide whether he uses an invention for good or evil.

sentences.cn: 人类常把自身的不幸归罪于天.
sentences.en: Man often accuses nature for his own misfortunes.

sentences.cn: 快点儿，像个男子汉的样子。
sentences.en: Come on, now─be a man.

sentences.cn: 在部队服役几年会使他成为真正的男子汉.
sentences.en: Several years'service in the army will make a man of him.

sentences.cn: 男子汉不应该随便卸责,应该有诺必践.
sentences.en: Instead of shifting the blame on others, a man must honor all his promises.

sentences.cn: 这个男孩把自己看作男子汉.
sentences.en: The boy regards himself as a real man.

sentences.cn: 您所看到的是一个慈祥和蔼的男子汉, 亲爱的.
sentences.en: All you see is a kind man, darling.

sentences.cn: 做个男子汉去迎接战斗, 那就是取得胜利的唯一途径!
sentences.en: Be a man and face the battle, That's the only way to win.

sentences.cn: 在两次大起义中,苏格兰失去了极勇敢的男子汉.
sentences.en: Scotland lost many of her bravest men in two great rebellions.

sentences.cn: 我要你在我面前像个男子汉, 而不是一个胆小鬼.
sentences.en: I wanted you to show me you are a man, not a mouse.

sentences.cn: 你丈夫有她的血, 一定是堂堂的男子汉, 你放心.
sentences.en: Your husband has her blood, he'll be a stalwart man, I can assure you.

sentences.cn: 男子汉参加陆军或海军,谁也不觉得奇怪.
sentences.en: Nobody can wonder that men are soldiers and sailors.

sentences.cn: 男子汉大丈夫危难时候要做到威武不屈!
sentences.en: A man should remain unyielding in the face of brutal force!

sentences.cn: 你们如此轻易地放弃你们的家园和权利,你们到底是些男子汉还是鼠流之辈?
sentences.en: Are you men or mice that you give up your lands and rights so easily?

sentences.cn: 男子汉一样地战斗, 还是奴隶般死去?
sentences.en: Fight as men, or die as slaves?

sentences.cn: 我相信这个伟大的“父亲”一定能培养出一个成功的男子汉!
sentences.en: We can say that this great father will must bring up a real man some day.

sentences.cn: 在美洲和欧洲万宝路广告上所塑造的是一个身体健强的美洲和欧洲男子汉形象.
sentences.en: The Marlboro man projects a strong masculine image in America and in Europe.

sentences.cn: 皮的真不像个男子汉.
sentences.en: Peter is not a true man.

sentences.cn: 一个男子汉不会听任别人的侮辱.
sentences.en: A man doesn't stand by and watch another insult him.

sentences.cn: 有些妇女干起活来,如同男子汉.
sentences.en: Some women work vigorously just like men.

sentences.cn: 如此的情况谁不会象一个男子汉一样行事 呢 ?
sentences.en: Who wouldn't play the man in such a situation?

sentences.cn: 我如何将你训练成男子汉?
sentences.en: How could I make a man out of you?

sentences.cn: 你是个男子汉,还是个懦夫?
sentences.en: Are you a man or are you a sheep?

sentences.cn: 男子汉们,挺起胸膛来! 要像个战士!
sentences.en: Thrust out your chests, men! Look like soldiers!

sentences.cn: 对呀, 我希望你成为一个真正的男子汉.
sentences.en: Yes, I wish you can be a true man.

sentences.cn: 大家注意, 今天我们要进行体能测验, 选出真正的男子汉!
sentences.en: OK everybody, today we're going to do a physical fitness test, which will soon sort out the men from the boys!

sentences.cn: 你不是懦夫, 你是一个男子汉; 小伙子, 爬起来, 去搏斗.
sentences.en: You is no worm, you is a man; so get up, lad, and fight.

sentences.cn: 身为男子汉而投身于人生激烈竞争之际意气消沉的话,宁可当个死人算了.
sentences.en: If a man sink discouraged upon a life of fierce competition asbe a dead man.

sentences.cn: 但我明白我已经是个男子汉了.
sentences.en: But then I understood I am a man.

sentences.cn: 男子汉大丈夫要大度点, 不要那么小器好 不好 ?
sentences.en: A man should be generous. Don't be so mean, OK?

sentences.cn: 这孩子根本不是孩子了, 而是一个强壮的有志向的男子汉了.
sentences.en: This boy is not a boy at all, but a strong, purposeful man.

sentences.cn: 克利福顿逃回家时, 我冲着他喊叫,要他回来,像个男子汉似的跟我干一仗.
sentences.en: When Clifton away home, I yelled at him to come back and fight like a man.

sentences.cn: 由于他愉快, 他成功地打发了他一生中最艰苦的做雇工的时光.
sentences.en: A happy man, he had managed to weather his hard and drudging existence than most.

sentences.cn: 雇工们喝到壶里的水很开心.
sentences.en: The men were glad to have that water in the jug.

sentences.cn: 一名农夫和他的雇工在一起吃早饭.
sentences.en: FARMER and his hired man were eating breakfast.

sentences.cn: 她跟雇工们愉快地攀谈起来.
sentences.en: She talked pleasantly to the men.

sentences.cn: 他的两个雇工协助接生员,于是孩子就出生了.
sentences.en: Two of his men assisted the midwife and the baby was born.

sentences.cn: 雇工把他的饭碗装满,开始吃第二顿饭.
sentences.en: The hired man refilled his plate and ate a second time.

sentences.cn: 该士兵的职责是操纵坦克车上的枪械.
sentences.en: The soldier's job was to man the gun on the tank.

sentences.cn: 该名消防队员操纵消防软管扑灭大火.
sentences.en: The firefighter manned the hose to extinguish the blaze.

sentences.cn: 艾德: 天哪! 瞧,这行李箱,都快撑开了. 我需要一个新的.
sentences.en: Ed : Oh, man! Look at this suitcase. It's falling apart. I need a new one.

sentences.cn: 天哪, 伙计, 你在发抖.
sentences.en: Jesus, man, you are shaking.

sentences.cn: 天哪, 看看女生怎么比喻我们男人!
sentences.en: Heavens, aa girl student why allegory our man!

sentences.cn: 我的天哪, 男人碰上这种女人,除了对她叩头膜拜之外,还能做什么呢?
sentences.en: My God, what would a man do with a woman like that except worshiping her?

sentences.cn: “ 天哪! 这是怎样一种人? ”
sentences.en: " My stars and garters! What sort of man this is? "
